text:
Hi Alexandro, Beads I imaged were in the center of the FOV to avoid aberrations. I can exclude excitation objectives because they are both brand new one. I don’t think or I hope that aberrations are not done by the emission objectives because I have same PSF shape by using the left or the right objective.
I can try what you mentioned, ie desaligned my gaussian beams and look at the effect.
keep in touch & I will keep you inform of my results
Cheers,
Sylvain
